attributes.action: DAMAGE OF 15,00,000 POUNDS BY HARASSMENT  THROUGH ADVANCE FEES/CHARGES SCAM BY BRITISH CYBER CRIMINALS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
